item.title: Create Lab from scratch on oracle linux
item.description: Step 1: Download oracle linux 8 Download oracle linux 8 from following repository: Oracle Linux download repository Step 2: Install dependencies Install following dependencies: dnf install -y iproute-tc vim Step 3: Disable firewall Disable firewall: systemctl stop firewalld systemctl disable firewalld systemctl mask firewalld Step 4: Disable selinux Disable selinux: sed -i s/^SELINUX=.*$/SELINUX=disabled/ /etc/selinux/config Step 5: Update system packages Update system packages with following command: dnf update Step 6: Install latest version of docker Add docker repository to server package repository:
